ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps again (specifically Bind Wound)
ygData.msgSnippet: 100 is the Bind wound cap for bards. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
ygData.messageBody:
100 is the Bind wound cap for bards.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Skill caps again (specifically Bind Wound)
>Date: Tue, 28 Sep 1999 02:27:25 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
>I have my bind skill at 100, it's incredibly useful for quickly getting
>back enough hit points to return to the fray (zoned out of Mistmoore with
>less than 30 five times in the past two days). I've maybe bound 40 wounds
>since I've hit this peak, and I haven't moved beyond it. I know a monk
>once told me his was at 135, so is 100 our ceiling?
>
>Athren Notechaser, dry-tongued from wound-licking
>
